mapper.select: select w.word_id, w.word_name_kr, w.word_name_en, w.word_summ, c.category_name from words w join words_categories wc join categories c on w.word_id = wc.wc_word_id and c.category_id = wc.wc_category_id where lower(w.word_name_en) like lower(concat(#{alphabet}, '%')) order by word_name_en;
